attributes.action: Please re-open the free Drop-Off / Pick-Up zone at Newquay Airport
attributes.additional_details:
You now have to pay £1 to drop-off or pick-up someone from Newquay Airport.  The drop off zone which had a 5 miunte waiting period has been closed.

To drop someone off at Newquay Airport you now have to park and pay or drop them on the busy main road.

This is a petition to get the airport to re-open the Drop-Off / Pick-Up zone.

For more info see:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-cornwall-20963092

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-cornwall-20946894

http://www.newquaycornwallairport.com/content/car-parking-newquay-cornwall-airport-nqy

I have started this petition because I beleive it is rediculous you have to pay to drop of freinds and family at the airport.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the airport management.
